welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wood-Ridge, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful parks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore our unique shops and restaurants."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Newark Liberty International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Newark Liberty International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C at Newark Liberty International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves a mix of domestic and international airlines, including American Airlines and British Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves mostly international airlines, including British Airways, Qatar Airways, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for chartered and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
